choices.text:
### Human:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for today.
### Assistant:

Sure, here’s an example of what I mean by “healthy”: 
- A bowl of oatmeal with blueberries and walnuts.  Oats are high in fiber which is good to keep you full between meals; the nuts provide healthy fats that can help boost your metabolism (and also make it taste delicious); berries contain antioxidants, vitamins, minerals and other nutrients essential for health 
- A small bowl of vegetable soup with lentils and kale.  Lentils are a great source of protein which will keep you full between meals; the greens provide fiber to fill you up as well as many important vitamins and minerals (and also make it taste delicious)
